title: 663. QB Guru John Beck on Zach Wilson, Justin Fields and Kyle Trask
itunes:title: 663. QB Guru John Beck on Zach Wilson, Justin Fields and Kyle Trask
description:
Daniel Jeremiah and Bucky Brooks are back with a new episode of Move the Sticks! In this special edition, Bucky is joined by NFL veteran John Beck, who now works as a motion mechanics instructor for 3DQB. This year, he's been able to train top quarterbacks for the upcoming draft including Zach Wilson, Justin Fields, Kyle Trask and KJ Costello. Beck speaks about his players development and the skills they will bring to the NFL. Move the Sticks is a part of the NFL Podcasts Network.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
